additional_params.description: Additional parameters to pass to Packer

build_uuid.description: UUID that is updated whenever the build has finished. This allows detecting changes.

directory.description: Working directory to run Packer inside. Default is cwd.

file.description: Packer file to use for building

triggers.description: Values that, when changed, trigger an update of this resource

directory.description: Directory to run packer in. Defaults to cwd.

file.description: Packer file to use for building

file_dependencies.description: Files that should be depended on so that the resource is updated when these files change

files_hash.description: Hash of the files provided. Used for updates.

block.description: Specify files to detect changes. By default, the current directory will be used.
